game.name: BomberZone
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, Steam 트레이딩 카드, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, Steam 순위표, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: The classic maze based strategic bombing game is back. Earth is invaded by aliens and you are in charge of your robotic soldier to defend it.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The classic maze based strategic bombing game is back. Earth is invaded by aliens and you are in charge of your robotic soldier to defend it.
